column30: Castañeda-Álvarez (2016). GRIN (2014)- the native distribution of Prunus salicina (Japanese plum). Prunus domestica (common or European plum) may have its origins in Asia_West, and as it is thought to be of hybrid origin involving P. cerasifera and possibly P. spinosa, their distributions overlap also in Europe_East_south.
